name: You Better Start Rotating
description:
In "You Better Start Rotating" you have to help our hero to escape from levels through portals.
The catch is... you cant control it. You can only control the blocks in the level.
Be wise... you can fall to the void, get trapped inside walls, get chopped by blades and other dangers.
Be pacient and retry and retry and retry. No time limits, infinite retrys.

Try the main mechanic inside the main menu!
